ygData.subject: Re: Looting LORE items
ygData.msgSnippet: uhhm...i believe crush s tunic is now lore.....not sure about the mace tho....
ygData.messageBody:
uhhm...i believe crush's tunic is now lore.....not sure about the mace tho....

Chas Watkins wrote:

> From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>
> With the introduction of LORE items. That is the No drop/No trade items.
>
> If you are in a PvP /Duel situation and you lose can the winner loot LORE
> items from your corpse.
>
> Does anyone know if the following are lore items
>
> Emperor Crush's armor
> Screaming Mace
>
> Does anyone have a definitive answer for what makes an item a lore item. Is
> it a quest item or merely a special drop item.
>
> Thanks
>
> Chas
